ðŸ“¦ PUBLISHING PACKAGE FOLDER
============================

This folder contains EVERYTHING you need to publish your package to PyPI.

ðŸš€ QUICK START:
1. Update setup.py (package name, version, author)
2. Set up ~/.pypirc with your PyPI token
3. Run: bash publish_to_live.sh

ðŸ“š DOCUMENTATION:
- START_HERE.md - Quick overview
- QUICK_PUBLISH.md - 3-step guide
- COMPLETE_PUBLISHING_GUIDE.md - Full details
